website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Overhaul - Debbir managed to meet the expectations of buyers when it came to comfort.  Wearers welcomed its versatility and durability for training sessions. Wearers also liked that it was lightweight and reasonably priced. The only complaint some purchasers had with the footwear was about its size and width.  But overall, the shoe’s reliable comfort and durability were just some of the reasons why it came highly recommended by owners.
pros: A vast majority of reviewers liked that the Skechers Overhaul - Debbir was comfortable to use for a myriad of physical activities
The overall style of the trainer pleased many owners
Numerous people were satisfied with the sizing and fit of the merchandise
The durability of this workout shoe was praised by several gym-goers
The lightweight nature of the product was lauded by a few testers
A couple of users claimed that the shoe was reasonably priced given its quality build
One person was delighted that this model was able to accommodate his custom orthotics after he removed the insole
cons: One user reported that the shoe's outsole is slippery on wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought I was going to send this back as I wanted a flatter bottom shoe. I have a tendency to roll my ankles on non-flat shoes. After going through three different pair I gave these a better look and see the sole is actually flared out, which I then thought hey maybe this will be okay. At that point I tried them on again even though I'd already generated my return paperwork...sure glad I did because these have proven to be an excellent shoe, as comfortable as any shoe I've ever worn and I just love them. In fact I just ordered another pair in the event they stop making them
customer_reviews.author: Roger- Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are some very comfortable shoes, I think I could walk all day in them, not to mention how attractive they are. What I like is that the size I chose is true to form. Some brands seem to be off a little, but these are right on.
customer_reviews.author: gant

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband reports: they are very comfortable! He wore them for ten hours while working a long day. He said that without these shoes he couldn't have made it through the day!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki  Lafreniere

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: Love these,had them for 2 months now, and they are still very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Racin-Jasun

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight comfortable athletic shoe in wide width.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are light weight and in a wide width which usually has limit selection. I like the style and color. It could be a little sturdier but that might be a trade off with the weight. I have another pair that haven't fallen apart in a couple of years. I'd recommend this as a comfortable, casual walking shoe. I would probably buy something else for frequent jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried these shoes due to cheap price and nice look. Shocked at how well the shoe is made, wears and has held up. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: T Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. I liked the look of theses shoes when I was at Macy's for $45. I tried them on and they were comfortable so I looked online and found them for $30 on Amazon and ordered them. I've had them a few weeks and they're still comfortable and nice to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Exercise or Casual Use
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of the Overhaul Debbirs and I really like them both for exercise and everyday use. I get them in the wide width for toe comfort, but have also found them to provide excellent support for my ankles. They're very light, but have good cushion and construction. They're great shoes at a good price for all activities.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: The sole is worthless
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers. They are super comfortable, and for the most part last quite a while. These are the cheapest ones I've ever experienced though! The sole is very thin and is wearing out after only two months of moderate use. I'm not getting this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great for people on their feet all day
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at Ross For Less and they were the best sneakers I’ve ever owned for being on my feet all day at work. They look and feel great and go with any outfit since they are black.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing them for 2 weeks now at work and they've been great! I'm a delivery driver and I'm on my feet for 8 hours a day. I always buy Sketchers because they're so comfortable, light, and look really good too!
customer_reviews.author: robert baker

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, great value
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear at work where I have to be on my feet 12 hours straight. Tremendously comfortable. I got 1/2 size larger than I usually wear because my feet swell a little during the long hours at work.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love Sketchers. They fit my wide foot great. I work at an ER so I’m on my feet a lot. They’re comfortable, match my scrubs and the bottom is gray instead of white so they don’t show dirt/discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Beasley

customer_reviews.title: The dark charcoal color shoe Amazon has posted is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has the wrong color posted for this shoe. It is not dark charcoal. While it is called charcoal, the actual shoe is grey & the S is a little bright blue & grey. Go to Skechers.com to see the correct color. Disappointed about the color I received, expected the darker color. I give Amazon 1 star for the wrong info. Otherwise, the shoe is light and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paristravel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: Its very hard for me to find the right shoes. Hate having to order custom shoes and cost alot. I found these in a store but one size too small, found them on Amazon and they are perfect! I usually don't look for shoes in stores very often but Happened to have stumbled across these. When they didn't have my size in store I got them on Amazon. Best shoe I have ever purchased! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Verno31

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit like my other pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair in Fred Meyer. They fit perfectly. It's hard to find a good pair so I ordered another pair on Amazon. I'm sure I got the right pair. These pair fit more snug around the toes than the other pair. I'm not sure if they sell a wider version
customer_reviews.author: Ali Al Qahtani

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is comfortable; sole wears out fast
customer_reviews.text: The sole wore out within a couple months of wearing it. The shoe is very comfortable and light, but wearing these shoes especially when it's raining or on any somewhat slick surface is dangerous; I've almost slipped an fell multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them! His feet are extra wide and he also has neuropathy. Sketchers-by far, have been the most comfortable shoe for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri T.

customer_reviews.title: Fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this pair of shoes. I think you always need to be a little leery about shoes bought online without trying them on but these fit as advertised. The memory foam is comfortable and supportive and provide good support. I have read other reviews of people not getting the wide type that they asked for, but I bought a 12 wide and they fit perfectly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fat Feet
customer_reviews.text: I have fat feet and once I found Skechers that is all i will buy they look good and are well made. Ever pare I have gotten has fit well and hold up well along with the price being good.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable from the start. I've been searching for navy colored comfort shoes for eons. I finally found something that is stylish, comfortable, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: JTPR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband’s 3rd or 4th pair of these! He loves them! He’s very hard on shoes but they hold up well!

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Skechers and I love them all. These did not change my mind. Glad I bought them.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. These are my everyday go to shoes. Super comfortable and they look nice. I recently had ankle surgery and these shoes are still comfortable when my foot swells up.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Little tight at the toes compared to sketchers similar shoe that I had bought previously. Still fits well. Color and look just as described and shown. No complaints about this one.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. I got my normal size with 2E extra width.  Buy and enjoy !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are really nice looking and seemed to fit well out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice looking and seemed to fit well out of the box. Great styling! The kicker came while walking a short distance, as the right toe box caused discomfort. Probably great shoes for many, but with that caution.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit overall super comfortable. The sneaker was a great fit and very nice looking. The price was amazing too much better than other stores. Didn't even need to use inserts because it offered such great support for feet.

customer_reviews.title: soles are wearing out fast.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe! I wear 12 E and these fit perfectly. Very easy break-in, and cloud comfortable from the start. I used these for travel and walkers/workout shoes while aboard ship. Great styling and well made from durable materials.

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion though out the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe

customer_reviews.title: Now what?
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bix, didn't even look at both until I put them on and went into the living room. My daughter said, hey Dad, why are you wearing two different shoes? My second pair of a different style we're fine, but these two are different models??

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pair of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many pairs of Sketchers—they are always extremely comfortable—and perfect for our 4 or 5 mile daily walks!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Short term comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Just as most Skechers. I work in a hospital and im always on my feet but the memory foam insole wears out after abt 2 to 3 months. I wish Skechers could make them more durable. But for 3 months you feet will be in heaven.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
